articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Thursday.
					 Kim Jong Un in his message extended warm congratulations to the Syrian president on the 55th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 The message said that after the March 8 revolution the Syrian army and people have made great progress in the struggle for building a new independent and prosperous society under the leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party.
					
					 Extending firm support and solidarity to the just cause of the president and friendly army and people of Syria to protect security and territorial integrity of the country, the message wished the president good health and bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia led by Director Anton Khlopkov left here for home on Thursday.
					 During the visit the delegation paid a courtesy call on Vice Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui and met with officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry and the Institute of International Studies of the DPRK and exchanged views over the issues of mutual concern, including the situation on the Korean peninsula and the relations between the DPRK and Russia.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark March 8 International Women's Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark March 8 International Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday, the 108th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 It was attended by senior party and government officials Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Hwi and Kim Su Gil, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Chairwoman of the C.C., Socialist Women's Union of Korea Jang Chun Sil, women officials, persons of merit and exemplary officials and members of the women's union of ministries, national institutions, institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women, women of foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Choe Hwi, alternate member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the women's movement of Korea is the Juche-oriented women's movement that was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and has covered the proud course of development under the wise guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The history of the Korean women's movement is closely associated with the exploits of Kang Pan Sok, an outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, and the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk, who dedicated themselves to resolving the women's problem, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 Today the Korean women's movement of Juche is ushering in the greatest heyday of its development as it holds respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The Korean women's movement has taken only the road of victory as a revolutionary and militant movement generation after generation and prided itself on being an example of the movement of world progressive women.
					
					 The reporter called upon all women to make a positive contribution to glorifying the glorious history and tradition of the Korean women's movement of Juche and achieving fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Forcing Japan to Pay for Its Crimes against Korean Nation Called for
articles.content:
Forcing Japan to Pay for Its Crimes against Korean Nation Called for
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims in a statement Thursday dealt with the new disclosure in south Korea of a video showing the barbaric massacre of Korean sexual slaves by the Japanese imperialists toward the end of the Second World War.
					 The video, kept at the U.S. National Archives, shows the footage of the scene of Korean women mercilessly killed by the Japanese imperialist aggressor troops in Yunnan Province of China on September 15, 1944 after being forced into the sexual slavery at battle fields.
					
					 An allied force operational journal was also disclosed to the effect that the Imperial Japanese Army shot to death 30 Korean women on September 13, 1944, whom they used to carry as sexual slaves.
					
					 The recently disclosed video and data indict for the barbarous acts committed by the Japanese imperialists, which can not be found in history of wars of any other country of the world, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The facts clearly prove that Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it committed hideous crimes against humanity that can never be redeemed for generations to come.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the hideous sexual slavery crime committed by Japan.
					
					 Still remaining unsettled is the resentment of the Korean women who were buried in desolate alien land after falling victim to the sexual slavery of the Japanese imperialists with their human dignity and chastity crudely violated.
					
					 However, the Abe group of Japan has gone impudent to say that "there is no data proving the forcible drafting of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army" and that "it was voluntary service for making money", insulting the victims of the sexual slavery. They even offered a few penny of money to traitor Park Geun Hye's group to cook up sort of "agreement" which they called "final and irreversible".
					
					 Faulting the reports of international organizations which pointed out Japan's despicable crimes, Japan openly forced their modification, and stubbornly called for the removal of statues of a sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army built in different countries. On the other hand, it has gone mischievous, persisting in brazen-facedly raising the "abduction issue". 
					
					 Far from repenting of the unprecedented crimes, Japan calls for "normal state" capable of fighting a war with the backing of the U.S., openly disclosing its ambition for reinvasion of the Korean peninsula and the Asian continent.
					
					 The cursed act of the Japanese reactionaries enough to enrage others and make blood boil is an intolerable mockery and insult to the Korean nation.
					
					 We will never pardon all crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation in the past, including the crimes related to the sexual slavery and will certainly force it to pay thousands-folds.

articles.title: Greetings to United Socialist Party of Venezuela
articles.content:
Greetings to United Socialist Party of Venezuela
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greeting to the National Leadership of the United Socialist Party of Venezuela on Thursday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of its founding.
					The message expressed the firm support and solidarity to the struggle of the United Socialist Party of Venezuela for defending the sovereignty of the country and the social and political stability under the banner of the Bolivarian revolution.
					
					It wished the party greater success in its activities, expressing belief that the solidarity and cooperative relations between the two parties will grow stronger in the common struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: DPRK Women Play Important Role in Different Fields of Society
articles.content:
DPRK Women Play Important Role in Different Fields of Society
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The atmosphere of respect and love for woman is evermore growing in the DPRK on the occasion of the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 All women in the country enjoy respect and love as a powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot and flowers of the country and the times for their important role in various sectors of social life.
					
					 Among them are servicepersons who defend the country with an ardent patriotism, officers' wives who share the same destiny with their husbands in safeguarding the country, deputies to the state power organs, party officials, managers, scientists, actresses and innovators who dedicate their all to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 In particular, world marathon queen Jong Song Ok, quadruple world Judo champion Kye Sun Hui, double Olympic medalist Rim Jong Sim and many other women have been awarded Kim Il Sung Prize, the titles of the DPRK Hero and Labor Hero and the titles of People's Athlete and merited Athlete.
					
					 And many laws and social policies like the law on protection of women's rights and socialist labor law have been enacted to guarantee their rights in the DPRK.

articles.title: Great Loving Care Enriching Women's Life
articles.content:
Great Loving Care Enriching Women' Life
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Greeting the 108th anniversary of the March 8 International Women's Day, all women in the DPRK are blessed with respect and love for adding pleasure to families with the ardent love for the country and patriotic devotion.
					 Their blessed life would have been unthinkable without the great loving care of the peerlessly great men who have created and brought into full bloom a grand flower garden of respecting women.
					
					 Women of the DPRK took their position as flowers of the country and the revolution under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung who ushered in the Korean women's movement and put forward them as a powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot through the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality.
					
					 Thanks to the love care and trust of leader Kim Jong Il who added glory to the dignified and happy life of women with his politics of prioritizing and respecting women, they became genuine revolutionaries dedicating themselves to the Party and the leader, the country and the people.
					
					 Now, their life attains the highest stage of happiness under the benevolent loving care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the noble intention of great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The respected supreme leader arranged a celebration performance on the occasion of the March 8 International Women's Day in Juche 101 (2012) and sent warm congratulations to all the women of the country. And he took a measure to institute Mother's Day, the first of its kind in the history of Korea, that year.
					
					 Under his profound loving care for women, the Breast Tumour Institute came into being at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and workers' hostels at the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill. And there are many other stories telling about his loving are for women.
					
					 Therefore, all the women in country are unanimous in highly praising the warm care of Kim Jong Un for women as the great parental love leading them to bloom up as flowers of the country, life and family.

articles.title: Newspapers Call upon Korean Women to Display Revolutionary Mettle
articles.content:
Newspapers Call upon Korean Women to Display Revolutionary Mettle
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK's newspapers carry editorials and articles on Thursday, the 108th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 The International Women's Day is a militant holiday to boost the international unity among working women of the world and demonstrate its might, the newspapers say.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun editorially notes there are billions of women in the world but no one but the Korean women leads a worthwhile life and fulfills the mission and duty for the country and nation. The editorial goes on:
					
					 The Korean women are true revolutionaries who do not hesitate to dedicate themselves to supporting the leader and defending the socialist country.
					
					 They resolutely defended President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in stern years of the revolution and devotedly implemented the lines and policies set forth by the leaders in any adversity.
					
					 The priceless efforts of our women permeate the development of Juche Korea shining with gigantic creations and epoch-making changes.
					
					 Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow. This is a patriotic will of our women turning out in the grand Mallima march.
					
					 Our women are creators of happiness, who beautify the grand flower garden of socialism with love and affection.
					
					 They are flowers of family, life and the country as they are devoting their clean and pure conscience to the future of the revolution and the motherland.
					
					 The reality seething with the revolutionary general offensive calls upon our women to perform miracles and feats.
					
					 Let's all women powerfully demonstrate the revolutionary mettle of the Korean women in the all-people general offensive towards the grand festival in September, single-heartedly united around the Party.
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial stresses that all the women should make a proactive contribution to achieving fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country by giving full play to their revolutionary mettle in the present general offensive.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Abe Group for Its Mendicant Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Abe Group for Its Mendicant Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- At the recent talks with the foreign minister of Finland, Japanese Foreign Minister Kono spat out rubbish that they should jointly cope with the DPRK's "nuclear and missile issue". Earlier, he met his Singaporean counterpart to beg for cooperation of Southeast Asian countries in pressurizing the DPRK, talking about its "evasion of sanctions".
					 When meeting the minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, he called upon all the countries to implement the sanctions against the DPRK. He insisted that Japan "agreed" with Mongolia to put pressure upon the DPRK in every way.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Thursday runs a commentary in this regard.
					
					 Citing detailed data, the commentary says the so-called "agreement" made public by the Abe group including Kono is a lie.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is a mendicant diplomacy of Kono who is going round the international arena and Japan's inveterate fraudulent diplomacy.
					
					 It is a miserable plight of Japan to dance to the tune of the U.S. master for the pressure on the DPRK. That is why the Japanese diplomacy is also mendicant one pursuant to the scenario written by the U.S.
					
					 Kono's nonsense against the DPRK is gibberish of a stupid whose ability to distinguish the situation is paralyzed.
					
					 Abe and Onodera are begging for ratcheting up "pressure on the DPRK" and "maintaining the attitude of pressure against the DPRK".
					
					 It is ludicrous for the Japanese reactionaries to go against the trend of detente on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Papers Disclose Hideous Unethical Crimes of Japan
articles.content:
Papers Disclose Hideous Unethical Crimes of Japan
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK Thursday denounce the massacres committed by Japanese imperialists against demonstrators in Taegu at the time of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The uprising that started with the large-scale anti-Japanese demonstration in Pyongyang on March 1, 1919 as the torch spread across the country including Seoul in the flash. Tens of thousands of students and patriotic people waged an unflinching action in Taegu on March 8 in defiance of the Japanese imperialist police's suppression, chanting slogans like "Long Live Independence of Korea!" and "Japanese and Japanese Army, Leave!"
					
					 Much upset by this, the Japanese imperialist aggressors buckled down to barbarous suppression.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article says that the Japanese imperialist police and military police fired bullets into peaceable empty-handed demonstrators, killing a number of Koreans.
					
					 The massacres in Taegue were just a tip of iceberg of the hideous massacres of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists, the paper said, detailing the data.
					
					 The suppression and massacres of the Koreans by the Japanese imperialists were hideous crimes against humanity baffling human imagination in view of barbarity and brutality.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries are still resorting to all kinds of tricks, neither admitting nor making reparations for the hideous crimes committed by them, the paper said, urging the need to settle accounts with the Japanese imperialists' hideous crimes against humanity to the last.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article denounces the impudent Japanese reactionaries for going keen on reinvasion moves while openly beautifying their history of aggression, not content with defying the voice of the international community for the abolition of the past.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Feb. 19.
					 The work, published on Feb. 19, Juche 63 (1974), clarifies the idea that modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism is the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea, and sets forth the important tasks and ways of Party ideological work for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Kyrgyzstan, Belarus, Bulgaria, Romania, France, Venezuela and Ecuador from Feb. 8 to 15 in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan who doubles as chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, praised Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding ideology in the era of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Belarusian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the DPRK won victory after victory in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the great thinker and theoretician and a man of action and general, adding that he is always remembered by the world progressives for his feats.
					
					 The secretary general of the Romania－Korea Friendship Association lauded Kim Jong Il as the great leader of the people who devoted his whole life to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and as the peerlessly elder statesman who clearly indicated the road to be followed by the world socialist movement.
					
					 The general coordinator of the Federal Political Secretariat of the United Left Party of Venezuela praised Kim Jong Il for making great contribution to the Korean revolution and the implementation of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Hungary
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Hungary
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Budapest on Feb. 21.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Feb. 21 to April 18 and decided to give wide publicity to the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the struggle of the Korean people performing miracles and making innovations in the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and hold colorful political and cultural functions such as lectures and film shows in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita al Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita al Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 8 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Le extiendo a usted mis calidas felicitaciones en ocasion del 55o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria.
					
					Despues de esta revolucion, el ejercito y el pueblo de Siria lograron un gran avance en la lucha por construir la nueva sociedad independiente y prospera bajo la direccion del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe.
					
					Aprovechando esta ocasion, envio el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la causa justa de usted y del ejercito y pueblo amistosos de Siria para defender la seguridad y la integridad territorial del pais y formulo votos por su salud y los mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Tuvo lugar acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
Tuvo lugar acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 108o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros del Partido y el gobierno Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Hui y Kim Su Gil, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, Jang Chun Sil, presidenta del Comite Central de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea, las funcionarias de los ministerios y organos centrales y de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas capitalinas, las benemeritas y las funcionarias y miembros ejemplares de la USMC.
					
					Fueron invitadas las coreanas residentes en ultramar, las mujeres de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Hui, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y vicepresidente, del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El orador apunto que el movimiento de las mujeres coreanas es el femenino del Juche iniciado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y recorrido por el camino orgulloso de su desarrollo bajo las sabias direcciones del Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la historia del movimiento femenino de Corea estan impregnadas las hazanas de Kang Pan Sok, destacada dirigente de este movimiento, y la heroina antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk quienes dedicaron todo lo suyo a la solucion del problema femenino.
					
					Senalo que hoy en dia, el movimiento femenino coreano del Juche prepara la era dorada de su desarrollo gracias al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Continuo que el movimiento en cuestion vino recorriendo por el unico camino de victoria como el revolucionario y combativo y exalta el orgullo como el modelo del movimiento femenino progresista del mundo.
					
					Subrayo que todas las coreanas deben glorificar la historia y tradicion orgullosas del movimiento femenino coreano del Juche y contribuir de modo activo a la lucha por lograr la nueva victoria en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita el decimo aniversario de fundacion de PSUV
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita el decimo aniversario de fundacion de PSUV
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del decimo aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Socialista Unido de Venezuela, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio un mensaje de felicitacion a la Direccion Nacional de PSUV.
					La misiva senala que el CC de PTC expresa el firme apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha de PSUV por defender la soberania del pais y la estabilidad social y politica bajo la bandera de Revolucion de Bolivar.
					
					Expreso la seguridad de que en el futuro se consolidaran y se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de apoyo, solidaridad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos en la lucha comun por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo y deseo lograr mayores exitos en las actividades del PSUV.
